attributes.action: changing gender from male to female surgeries by the NHS be the same
attributes.additional_details:
Because it would make the transgender happier in there bodies
Transgender people  that are changing gender from male to female should be able to have the same surgeries eg breasts on top  by the NHS like they do in Scotland we should have the same.
attributes.background: I want the NHS to make this available to every transgender person  going from male to female to do the surgery  from top to bottom

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. 

Decisions on whether to offer specific procedures as part of gender reassignment surgery are a clinical matter for the NHS. The NHS in England is operationally independent from the Government.
